Description :
        "I want to be your pet"It's New Year's Eve and Fumiharu Matsunaga (19 years-old) is unable to visit his family due to a blizzard. His heat is near, so he knows he shouldn't go out, but when from his window he spots national-treasure-level hottie Tamaki Kamioka (24 years-old) covered in snow, he rushes to bring him indoors.At first, Fumiharu is flustered by naughty Tamaki's sweet advances, but gradually he starts to warm up to them...Now he can't escape from his clingy pet's obsessive adoration! Is this a master's destiny...?!A Peerless Obsessive Puppy dog Alpha & Upbeat Captive Virgin Omega's lu**-filled, immoral Omegaverse!
